title: Arooga's(TM) Grille House & Sports Bar selects Naranga(TM) Software Solutions to Drive and Manage Growth
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/13/2015 @ 10:14 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Naranga 
ATLANTA, Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Arooga's((TM)) Grille House & Sports Bar , the rapidly expanding franchise recently selected America's Next Top Restaurant Franchise, has chosen Naranga((TM)) to provide software solutions needed to drive and manage the chain's franchise growth. 
Arooga's, based in Harrisburg, Penn., has nearly 100 units open, in development or under contract and will use Naranga's ncompass(TM) software solution, which creates operational efficiencies and economies of scale for franchising systems managing their business across multiple locations - from concept to cash. 
The ncompass solution leverages centralized information management with integrated business processes including site build out, centralized document management, day-to-day marketing execution, financial accounting, compliance, vendor management, integrated procurement and more. Businesses take advantage of ncompass to collapse time to revenue, increasing system-wide margins while controlling their overall business costs. Additionally, ncompass will provide Arooga's with cohesive operations management while assimilating all of their day-to-day business processes into a unified solution while increasing output and efficiency. 
"By using ncompass , we will be able to communicate, build, share and measure all the necessary steps that need to be in place to guarantee brand expansion," says Keith Swade, Director of Franchising at Arooga's. "As we focus on providing the best possible experience for our customers, it is important that we also have a clear focus on our business growth strategy. Naranga has the tools in place to allow us to control our brand and meet the ever-changing technological needs of our franchise model." 
Based in Atlanta, Naranga offers a suite of franchise management technology solutions for businesses with multiple locations. Naranga software provides enhanced communication and proactive business intelligence that drives bottom line results by using emerging technologies to seamlessly integrate all sales, operations and marketing activities. In addition, specific features can be tailored to each company's unique business processes, and all applications are developed with a mobile-first approach due to the increasing use of mobile devices over traditional management tools. 
"The Naranga solution set was born from a business owner, not a technology owner," says Greg Berman, president of Naranga. "Solutions are created by wrapping the business need around the technology, not the technology around the business." 
Built for a growing enterprise, Naranga solutions allow users to manage, measure and maintain consistency across all locations with a best-in-class operations management platform. 
About Naranga Naranga is a 'mobile-first' software solutions company focused on the franchise, retail and hospitality verticals. From converting leads to managing enterprise to providing next generation B2C direct marketing, Naranga's disruptive solutions provide measurable business benefits to customers. Naranga customers are equipped to manage, measure and maintain consistency across all their business while on-the-go. 
More information is available at www.naranga.com or by sending an e-mail to sales@naranga.com . 
About Arooga's Grille House & Sports Bar Arooga's Grille House & Sports Bar is an innovative full-service casual restaurant and bar with a sports and entertainment focus that combines exceptional food and beverages, with unique concepts, and proprietary operational strategies. Arooga's Grille House & Sports Bar was founded in July 2008, and currently operates 10 corporate locations in Central Pennsylvania and 88 franchise locations either open or in development. Arooga's founders are taking the "unique sports and entertainment restaurant & bar" concept national and are offering franchising opportunities to qualified multi-unit candidates. For more information, visit www.aroogas.com , or contact Keith Swade, Director of Franchise Development at keithswade@aroogas.com .
